zsut.bio: Hi! 👋 My name is Zsolt. I am currently working as a .NET developer at 4sys. My main strength is C#, as I used to be interested in making video games in Unity.

david.bio: Hello!👋 I am mainly fascinated by the world of IoT. For this reason, words like Home Assistant, Raspberry Pi, Arduino, Linux, etc. really excite me..🤣
